attributes.action: Put speeds bumps outside all schools!
attributes.additional_details: For the safety of the children.
attributes.background: Outside  schools  there can be a heavy traffic flow. I feel it’s very dangerous for the children. I think there should be speed bumps outside all schools.

rejection.details:
The responsibility of road safety measures lies with each local authority. It would be a matter for your local council to decide if speed bumps are necessary. 

You could start a petition calling for a review of road safety measures outside all places of education if that is something you would like to see happen. You may also like to sign this petition we currently have open on a similar topic:

Review speed limits outside all places of education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559842
